snippet.title: TRIBE NINE | First Game Trailer
snippet.description:
◤◢◤TRIBE NINE First Game Trailer◢◤◢

Akatsuki Games and the creators of #Danganronpa
proudly present the first game trailer for PC/mobile Extreme Action RPG "TRIBE NINE"!

▼ Wishlist on Steam
store.steampowered.com/app/2376580/TRIBE_NINE/

▼ Recruiting Closed Beta Testers
tribenine.tokyo/en/   

▼About this work
"TRIBE NINE" promises an intense experience where players will face relentless challenges and devise strategies to overcome formidable enemies.

The initial world design was developed by the creators of the “Danganronpa” series. Players can explore a mystery-filled drama with unique characters in a meticulously crafted world with a variety of art styles.

▼ Official Website
tribenine.tokyo/en/   

▼ Official X
x.com/tribenine_en

#AkatsukiGames
#TookyoGames
#deathgame 
#actionrpg
